description.value:
A spray of rainbow light beams cascades from your open hand. Each creature in the area must roll 1d8 on the table below to see which beam affects it, then attempt a saving throw of the indicated type. The table notes any additional traits that apply to each type of ray. If a creature is struck by multiple beams, it uses the same d20 result for all its saving throws. For all rays, a successful saving throw negates the effect for that creature.

Prismatic Spray

[[/r 1d8 #Prismatic Spray]]ColorSaveEffects (Traits)
1RedReflex@Damage[50[fire]] damage (fire)
2OrangeReflex@Damage[60[acid]] damage (acid)
3YellowReflex@Damage[70[electricity]] damage (electricity)
4GreenFortitude@Damage[30[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 minute (poison)
5BlueFortitudeAffected as if by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Petrify]
6IndigoWill@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Confused], as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Warp Mind] spell (mental)
7VioletWill@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed] for 1 minute; if a critical failure, sent to another plane, as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Interplanar Teleport] (teleportation)
8Potent beam-Affected by two beams - roll twice, rerolling any duplicates or results of 8
